articles.description: Kyle Busch was among the playoff drivers who had problems in Sunday's Southern 500 that had an impact on the playoff standings.
articles.content:
DARLINGTON, S.C. There was fire and there was rain. And venerable Darlington Raceway, which hosted its first Cup race in 1950, showed it is still as difficult as ever.
The result is a jumbled playof… [+3667 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from Auburn’s 42-16 win against Mercer - AL.com
articles.description: Here are some lessons from Auburn's 42-16 win on opening week.
articles.content: Bryan Harsin started his second season as Auburns head coach with Saturdays resounding 42-16 victory against Mercer. Auburn rushed for nearly 300 yards. T.J. Finley was the Tigers starting quarterbac… [+5012 chars]

articles.title: ‘No Courage to Spell Her Name’ – Fans Slam Serena Williams’ Ex-coach Patrick Mouratoglou Over His Poorly Structured Tribute - EssentiallySports
articles.description: Fans slam American tennis star Serena Williams’ former coach Patrick Mouratoglou for not mentioning her name in her retirement post.
articles.content: Serena Williams has hung her racket at the on-going US Open. The 40-year-old was playing in the last Grand Slam of the year but could not go past her Australian opponent Ajla Tomljanovi in the third … [+3359 chars]
